cyclone.name: MINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 90 miles WSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward toward the Florida Panhandle, then expected to sweep across southern Georgia and off the South Carolina coast into the western Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Panhandle (near Mexico Beachâ€“Steinhatchee River area)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Mexico Beach to Steinhatchee River Florida (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Panhandle, then coastal Georgia and South Carolina
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; breeze below gale force only.
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant storm surge expected at the port from Mindy.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated light showers possible; heavier rain remains well east of the port.
